C

check(Player) - Static method in class commandline.TeamSizeLimit
Takes the player and checks the team size (max is 4), promting the user to select one to remove one if there are to many.
checkIfActiveMonster() - Method in class game.Player
A function to check whether the team can still fight and set the active monster variable to the first awake monster if the current active monster is fainted.
chooseBattle(GameEnvironment) - Method in class commandline.BattleCommandLine
Command line interface for choosing a battle, the possible battles are displayed, and the player can choose to fight one, or exit to the prievious menu, if a battle is fought and one it is removed from the current battles for this day.
closeBattleScreen(BattleScreen) - Method in class GUI.ScreenManager
Closes the battle screen, and launches the main screen again.
closeGameOverScreen(GameOverScreen) - Method in class GUI.ScreenManager
Closes the given game over screen and launches the setup screen, starting a new game..
closeItemsScreen(ItemScreen) - Method in class GUI.ScreenManager
Closes the given item screen and launches the main screen.
closeMainScreen(MainScreen) - Method in class GUI.ScreenManager
Closes the given main screen.
closeSetupScreen(SetupScreen) - Method in class GUI.ScreenManager
Closes the given setup screen and launches the main screen, beginning the main loop of the game.
closeShopScreen(ShopScreen) - Method in class GUI.ScreenManager
Closes the given shop screen and launches the main screen.
closeTeamScreen(TeamScreen) - Method in class GUI.ScreenManager
Closes the given team screen and launches the main screen.
